page.title: 14Employment continued
page.content:
We visited Swifts Meat Store and were shown around by Mr Carr. The store opens up at 3am. The meat comes from all over the country. The butchers come to choose their meat. There were sides of beef, whole pigs and lambs for sale, as well as bacon, ham and chickens. It was very cold in there as it is all refrigerated. Preetpal Aged 7yrs
We counted how many people had someone in their family working at the airport. It was nearly everyone in the school. Our Chairman of Governors, Mr White works for British Airways. He came and talked to us. Mr Peel is another of our Governors and he got us lots of posters for our project. I expect I will work at the airport one day if I stay in Stanwell. I hope so.
